General.Name: TBI Motion Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: TBI MOTION Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells linear motion products in Taiwan and internationally. Its products include miniature and self-lubricating series linear guides; ball splines; miniature, ball screw, finished shaft end, end-caps circulation, external circulation, and internal circulation ball screw series; rotary series ball screw and ball splines; single axis actuators; linear ball bearings, slide shafts, and slide shaft supports; fixed and floated side ball screw support units; and couplings. The company's products have applications in the automation, robot, semi-conductor, industrial machinery, medical equipment, and green energy industries, as well as in machine tools, and warehousing and retrieval systems. TBI MOTION Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 123, Sanduo Rd., New Taipei City, Taiwan, 23876
